name: @wedxml/core
description: Wed is a schema-aware editor for XML documents.
author: Louis-Dominique Dubeau <louisd@mangalamresearch.org>

scripts.config: mkdir -p build/config && cp -rp ../../config/* build/config && cp -rp ../../local_config/* build/config
scripts.tsc: npm run generate-ts && tsc -p src/tsconfig.json --outDir build/dist/dev/lib && tsc -p src/wed/cli/tsconfig.json --outDir build/dist/dev/lib
scripts.copy-web: mkdir -p build/dist/dev/lib && cp web/*.html build/dist/dev/ && cp web/*.js build/dist/dev/lib
scripts.copy-schemas: mkdir -p build/schemas && cp schemas/*.js build/schemas/ && (cd schemas; cp --parents `find . -name '*.rng'` ../build/schemas)
scripts.bin: mkdir -p build/dist/bin && sed -e's;../build/dist;..;g' bin/wed-metadata > build/dist/bin/wed-metadata && chmod +x build/dist/bin/wed-metadata
scripts.build-dev: npm run config && npm run clean-package && npm run copy-src && npm run bin && npm run copy-web && npm run yml-to-json && npm run tsc && npm run less && npm run copy-schemas && tasks/make-schema-metadata && tasks/make-samples && npm run generate-build-info && npm run build-bundled-doc && cp -p README.md npm-shrinkwrap.json build/dist && echo 'dist/dev/lib/tests/**' > build/dist/.npmignore && mkdir -p build/ajax
scripts.lint: npm run generate-ts && tslint -t verbose -p src/tsconfig.json && eslint 'src/**/*.js' *.js bin/* 'config/**/*.js' 'web/**/*.js' 'tasks/**/*.js' && npmPkgJsonLint package.json
scripts.test: npm run build-test-files && npm run test-karma && npm run test-karma-webpack
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build-prod && npm run typedoc && ./tasks/make-gh-pages
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build-prod && npm run test
